derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 2): from Latin, comparative of inferus 'low'

entry.def: Something that is inferior is not as good as something else.

example.ex: The cassettes were of inferior quality...
This resulted in overpriced and often inferior products...
example.tran: 这就导致了标价过高而往往质量低劣的产品的出现。

entry.tran: (地位、能力等)低等的,低于…的;下级的
entry.def: If one person is regarded as inferior to another, they are regarded as less important because they have less status or ability.

example.ex: He preferred the company of those who were intellectually inferior to himself.
example.tran: 他喜欢与那些智力水平不如他的人共处。

example.ex: ...the inferior status of women in pre-revolutionary Russia...
example.tran: 革命之前俄国妇女的低微地位

means.word_mean: 1. one of lesser rank or station or quality
2. a character or symbol set or printed or written beneath or slightly below and to the side of another character
1. of or characteristic of low rank or importance
4. written or printed below and to one side of another character
5. having an orbit between the sun and the Earth's orbit;
6. lower than a given reference point;
7. falling short of some prescribed norm;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词或表名词,"较……的;较……"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 下等的,下级的;劣等的,差的
stems_affixes.word_buile: infer下面+ior较……的;较……→adj.下等的,下级的;劣等的,差的 n.下级,晚辈
inter在……内+ior较……的;较……→adj.内部的,里面的 n.内部,内地
sen老+ior较……的;较……→adj.年长的;地位较高的 n.[大学]四年级学生
super在……上面+ior较……的;较……→adj.优良的,卓越的;上级的 n.上级;长者;高手

stems_affixes.value_cn: 较晚的,较远的,不可告人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ulter远+ior较……的;较……→adj.较晚的,较远的,不可告人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 年少的/者,三年级的/学生,下级[的]
stems_affixes.word_buile: jun年轻+ior较……的;较……→adj.&n.年少的/者,三年级的/学生,下级[的]
infer下面+ior较……的;较……→adj.下等的,下级的;劣等的,差的 n.下级,晚辈
inter在……内+ior较……的;较……→adj.内部的,里面的 n.内部,内地
sen老+ior较……的;较……→adj.年长的;地位较高的 n.[大学]四年级学生
super在……上面+ior较……的;较……→adj.优良的,卓越的;上级的 n.上级;长者;高手

sentences.en: They sell inferior goods at that store.
The food at that restaurant is inferior.

sentences.en: The house is inferior to what I expected.
sentences.cn: 那房子比我所期望的差。

sentences.en: A good leader should get on well with inferiors.
sentences.cn: 一个好的领导应当与部下相处融洽。
